thread.title: After Nordstrom Caves to Liberal Pressure, Another Massive Retailer Drops Ivanka’s Brand
thread.title_full: After Nordstrom Caves to Liberal Pressure, Another Massive Retailer Drops Ivanka’s Brand

author: John S. Roberts
title: After Nordstrom Caves to Liberal Pressure, Another Massive Retailer Drops Ivanka’s Brand
text:
Being the child of a president can’t be easy. 
Having to constantly watch your father degraded every which way by nearly every single media outlet would get rough very quickly. 
For Ivanka Trump – who has been called a dog by an effeminate, cowardly film director – it’s especially hard on her pocketbook. 
Just the other day, Nordstrom announced they were done with Ivanka’s brand. 
Today, Neiman Marcus is pulling the same BS. 
Truth Revolt , “Hours after Nordstrom announced it had cut ties with Ivanka Trump’s brand , the first daughter’s fashion line has disappeared from Neiman Marcus’ website,” reports Business Insider. 
… 
“Nordstrom, which has also been a target of the protests, said Thursday that it decided to stop carrying Ivanka Trump’s brand because of declining sales,” reports BI. 
“Each year we cut about 10% [of brands carried] and refresh our assortment with about the same amount,” a Nordstrom representative told Business Insider. “In this case, based on the brand’s performance we’ve decided not to buy it for this season.” 
Oh, cut it out! 
Ivanka’s brand was part of the “10%” cut because certain higher-ups aren’t fans of her father. 
Who are they trying to fool? 
Are we idiots? 
Seems to me like Nordstrom and Neiman Marcus have no problem alienating half of the country when there’s absolutely no point. LIKE this article?
